body_html:
We decided not to do shallow git clone, because

  1. the space saving is not significant, compared to the space saving brought by removing bazel build cache as implemented in 8a72421 for issue #4116
  2. the git history may be useful for certain development purposes.

Closing this issue.

the git history may be useful for certain development purposes.

Closing this issue.
body:
We decided not to do shallow git clone, because
1) the space saving is not significant, compared to the space saving brought by removing bazel build cache as implemented in https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/commit/8a724211a9d4871338afe874276abf1d358f799b for issue    https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/4116
2) the git history may be useful for certain development purposes. 

Closing this issue.
